summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 29th Avenue Northwest, from West 80th Street to West 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with property owners' 100% limit petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 190283, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
